akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 93–618, title VI, § 602(e), Jan. 3, 1975, 88 Stat. 2072

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1917. Repealed. Pub. L. 93–618, title VI, § 602(e), Jan. 3, 1975, 88 Stat. 2072
Section, Pub. L. 87–794, title III, § 317(a), Oct. 11, 1962, 76 Stat. 889, made provision for tax assistance to firms.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective on the 90th day following Jan. 3, 1975, see note set out under section 1901 of this title.
